product.longDescription:
Create your own travel stories with this Wavebreaker Disney collection! The texture helps to protect the surface against scratches, and the romantic Minnie Loves Mickey design has been designed especially for those who prefer travelling in Disney style.
• Mounted lock to keep your case secure while en route.
• Cross ribbons, zipped divider and pocket allow easy storing.
• Carry-On size and weight allowances vary by airlines. Go to samsonite.ca/AirlineBaggageAllowances for more details. If the bag is overstuffed, it may not be accepted by the airlines.
• Weight: 5.8 lbs.

Body Dimensions: 19.0" x 15.5" x 7.75"
Overall Dimensions: 21.0" x 15.5" x 7.75"
product.shortDescription: Travel in Mickey style with this American Tourister x Comic Mickey harside suitcase! This bag will show off your personality while giving you all the bells and whistles you need while traveling!

tooltip: Luggage is made from a vacuum-formed or pressure-formed shell. Strong ABS plastic, a temperature-resistant, highly impact-resistant material, is combined with a textured finish for the classic hardside look that is strong and lightweight.
To learn more about TSA locks and how to set the lock please visit our lock instructions page
Warranty covers manufacturing defects. For more information please visit our warranty page

product.pageTitle: Wavebreaker Disney Carry-On Spinner | Hardside Luggage | American Tourister
